snippet: SEIDLER--Sheldon. October 25, 1930-November 23, 2015. Renowned graphic designer, painter, sculptor, teacher. Father to Elana Werts and Heidi Sanchez. Grandfather to Matt, Kody and Ariel. Forever in our hearts. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SEIDLER--Sheldon. October 25, 1930-November 23, 2015. Renowned graphic designer, painter, sculptor, teacher. Father to Elana Werts and Heidi Sanchez. Grandfather to Matt, Kody and Ariel. Forever in our hearts. 1/3
